originalText.text: Dr. Priyanka Singh is a wonderful.  Doctor Singh, was very knowledgeable. She was patient. And she made me feel comfortable enough to tell her what my problem was. I would recommend her to anyone , whether, it be a friend or a stranger. Plus There wasn't a long wait to see her. She was right on time. I can't say enough about her..

text.text: Dr. Priyanka Singh is a wonderful.  Doctor Singh, was very knowledgeable. She was patient. And she made me feel comfortable enough to tell her what my problem was. I would recommend her to anyone , whether, it be a friend or a stranger. Plus There wasn't a long wait to see her. She was right on time. I can't say enough about her..

originalText.text: Dr. Singh she was absolutely amazing! Very considerate, and very compassionate to how I was feeling . She took her time with me didn’t rush me off to attend to another patient bcs they are on schedules  but allowed me to talk, so that she could get a better understanding of what symptoms I was experiencing. She gave opinions and suggestions, and what steps to do to get to the bottom of what I was having issues with. I think her work ethics, are great.

originalText.text: Very professional and caring.  Dr Singh asked so many questions to assure the right care plan for me. I am very grateful.

originalText.text: Doctor Singh is a Great, caring, kind Doctor, all nurses, and entire staff are hard working and caring. Doctors Singh and Cavalier are two of the best! I would recommend to everybody!
